title: I am a 3rd year mechanical engineer willing to attempt GATE '16. How should I start preparing, what are all the books required, and how do I score smartly? - Quora

response.answer_text: if you have good coaching institute in your city then go for it or else take a postal course from madeasy and start preparing from now and try to complete syllabus by nov Dec, after that do revision and enrollee test series from madeasy and practice.... All the best
